DOC.brief_summary: A survey (patient self-report) of patients presenting to UAB emergency room, outpatient trauma clinics and substance abuse center for symptoms of post-traumatic stress disorder and maladaptive coping responses after the widespread tornado disaster that occurred in Alabama in April 2011.
DOC.brief_title: Development of Post Traumatic Stress Disorder After Natural Disaster
DOC.criteria: 19 and older Able and willing to complete a questionnaire Younger than 19 Unwilling or unable to complete a questionnaire
